name: EmailPress
author: Kvvaradha

sections.description:
A Simple/Small NewsLetter Plugin to schedule and send newsletters whenever a post is published. You have options to cutomizations to make changes and

Features

  • Easy use
  • Less settings
  • Queue Size can be defined
  • Custom Color, Logo, Texts, etc.
sections.installation:
1. Upload EmailPress to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
N/A

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload EmailPress to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
